title: Everybody rides the carousel. Parts 1-3
creator_credit: John Hubley, Faith Hubley, Hubley Studios and Pyramid Films
brief_description: A view of Erik H. Erikson’s “Eight stages of life”. A whimsical, power-packed animated film that depicts life as a carousel with eight horses representing the up-down, push-pull, positive-negative aspects of each of the eight stages.
creator_credit_for_label: John Hubley, Faith Hubley, Hubley Studios and Pyramid Films
